summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique All About Shadow Quad makes it easy to add color and depth for a range of eye looks, from natural to dramatic. Long-wearing.
details: DetailsBenefitsEnjoy a wardrobe of eye looks in one palette.Wear shades alone or mix and layer them to define, contour, highlight.Long-wearing, crease-resistant, and fade-resistant.Mirrored compact with illustrated how-tos.Two sponge-tip applicators.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2262081How To UseUse applicator to sweep an allover base shade across entire lid, lashline to brow. Create dimension with medium-toned shades. Layer and blend colour into the crease and/or along lashlines. Deepest shade can be applied as a liner along lashlines using the applicator tip. For a more detailed application, choose specialists from Clinique's Makeup Brush Collection. Remove with your favourite Clinique makeup remover.IngredientsIngredients: Mica, Zinc Stearate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Alumina, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Carmine (Ci 75470), Chromium Hydroxide Green (Ci 77289), Chromium Oxide Greens (Ci 77288), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)] Rds Product Name: All About Shadow Division: Cl (Clinique)Ingredients: Mica, Zinc Stearate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Alumina, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Carmine (Ci 75470), Chromium Hydroxide Green (Ci 77289), Chromium Oxide Greens (Ci 77288), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)]Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use applicator to sweep an allover base shade across entire lid, lashline to brow. Create dimension with medium-toned shades. Layer and blend colour into the crease and/or along lashlines. Deepest shade can be applied as a liner along lashlines using the applicator tip. For a more detailed application, choose specialists from Clinique's Makeup Brush Collection. Remove with your favourite Clinique makeup remover.
ingredients: Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)] Rds Product Name: All About Shadow Division: Cl (Clinique)Ingredients: Mica

reviews.headline: not very pigmanted
reviews.comments: I threw it away the color applies very light

reviews.headline: I would buy again and aging.
reviews.comments: Smooth blend able application.  Moody shades that look amazing.

reviews.headline: Love it !
reviews.comments: I have mature skin and the eyeshadow goes on smooth and velvety without settling in the lines and creases. The pallet is beautiful and watching a few people apply it online was extremely helpful. I don't wear makeup every day but, this is  very easy to apply and, very forgiving.

reviews.headline: Improve Descriptions!!!!
reviews.comments: I am somewhat colorblind, and I am 67 years of age. So it would be really helpful if you would describe all the colors in the palette. It would also be nicer if things would expand and the print was just a little bit larger. So I don't have to get out my reading glasses after I got my cataract surgery done. I've been using Clinique since I've been a teenager. So I'm not the only one that has a problem with the print being too light or too small. And is it really that hard to give a better description? I see people were asking if the finish was matte.  Seriously you're putting together information online, and every minor detail matters on whether or not I choose your product or somebody else's

reviews.headline: I buy this product usually monthly!
reviews.comments: Best eye shadow! Goes on very smooth and stays on all day!

reviews.headline: Wild buy again
reviews.comments: Excellent mix of colors which last all day in compact case

reviews.headline: Love the productâ€¦but
reviews.comments: I love Clinique products! But ordered the Teddy Bear shade of this eye shadow quad and the colors I received are very different from what is pictured.  The actual product is all matte shades and the picture shows shimmery shades.

reviews.headline: beautiful colors
reviews.comments: colors are beautiful and product goes on and stays on without powdery flakes

reviews.headline: Lovely eyeshadow
reviews.comments: This eyeshadow glides on smoothly even on my 56 year old eye lids.  High quality product.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: Love the colors, very easy to apply. All day wear!

reviews.headline: Teddy Bear is not a shimmer palette as advertised
reviews.comments: Bought this for my mocha mousse inspired makeup looks. I will say that I do like this palette but I'm glad I didn't pay full price or I would return it. The colors are very soft and need a good primer to show up well. I layer mine on a brown base and they are light and soft enough to give me a blended clean look. However, I was hoping for them to be as shimmery as pictured. This has made me leery of ordering from Clinique again. Although this palette works for my needs, its not what was advertised when I purchased it.

reviews.headline: Not enough pigment
reviews.comments: I got the pink chocolate quad and was looking forward to trying Clinique as my skin is sensitive. Unfortunately, I can't see this on my skin even though my skin is very fair. It's like it's invisible! Won't layer or darken, no matter how much I use.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this again
reviews.comments: I'm very happy with the colors and how nice it looks on!

reviews.headline: Great for my sensitive eyes!
reviews.comments:
I love that these shadows are long- 
wearing and still kind to my sensitive eyes. They go on smoothly and have great, build able color.

reviews.headline: Great size for travel
reviews.comments: Just what I was looking for.

reviews.headline: Have always liked Clinique products.
reviews.comments:
Clinique eye shadows are great. This "going steady" quad is great for bringing out my hazel
eyes.

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: Color doesn't stay on. Poor pigment quality.

reviews.headline: Matte Eyeshadow Perfect for Mature Eyes
reviews.comments: This is my go to eyeshadow because it is matte and does not accentuate my older skin. Also, it is neutral so it looks more natural.

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: This palette is so pretty but there is 0 color payoff. This is a new formula I think because  I had the Pink Chocolate years ago and it was beautiful.  This was a complete waste of money.

reviews.headline: Yes woul but it again
reviews.comments: Love this product

media.headline: I love Clinique. All my make are from them
media.caption: Love them

faceoff_positive.comments:
This is my one and only eye shadow product. I have used this for years and years for my hazel/brown eyes. All the shades are matte and just beautifully natural. The off white can be a great under brow or all over base. The light tan shade is identical to my eyelid color...a totally nude flesh tone. The taupe shade is a light grey brown and is very pretty in the crease or even under the eye as a liner. The darkest shade is a warm coffee brown that I totally use as my upper eye lid liner alone most of the time or with my quick-liner by Clinique in dark chocolate.
I use brushes for application and the powder glides on nicely, very smooth application.
I don't use a primer and the eye shadow holds up for a good 8 hours easily.
I think what I love the most is that the colors are matte. Frosted shimmering shades really age the eye, these shades just look natural and warm and youthful, doing what eye shadow is meant to do: accentuate the eyes, not the eyeshadow you're wearing or eye wrinkles!
faceoff_positive.headline: Teddy Bear

faceoff_negative.comments: I am so frustrated because I was using Choco-Latte and it's been discontinued and I also use Teddy Bear but the eyeshadow is different now. Why change something that works so well? These eyeshadows don't work any better than the drugstore brands which I may as well buy and save a lot of money. Clinique, you blew it. Your eyeshadows were one of your best items. You've lost an eyeshadow customer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Why do you change and discontinue?
